attributes.action: Stop the deaths of 100k people by giving people in care the support they deserve
attributes.additional_details:
Further details here in the press:
Denis Campbell for The Guardian on 27th Nov 2018
NHS to look into deaths of 100,000 mental health patients a year
https://www.theguardian.com/society/2018/nov/27/nhs-deaths-mental-health-patients-england#QBAIN
attributes.background: Every year more than 100,000 people die in care, that’s almost one person dying every 5 minutes. That’s someone’s Mum, Dad, Son, Daughter, Brother or Sister. Families are left devastated, often without answers and many are prevented from finding out what happened.

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about the deaths of people who are receiving treatment for mental health problems, but we're not sure exactly what action you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
